original_text: The believers finished praying. The house where they were meeting together shook. God filled them all with his Holy Spirit. That made them very brave and they spoke God's message clearly to people.
korean_text: 빌기를 다하매 모인 곳이 진동하더니 무리가 다 성령이 충만하여 담대히 하나님의 말씀을 전하니라

sentences.original_text: The house where they were meeting together shook
God filled them all with his Holy Spirit
and they spoke God's message clearly to people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 사람들에게 하나님의 말씀을 분명히 전했습니다
